item.description:
South Windsor; directions will be sent.

I love Fall and all the autumn dishes of New England, bring a fall-inspired dish or drink and let’s have a game night in my condo’s clubhouse! Lots of space to play, eat or socialize!

BYOB, and BYOG (Game, if you have a favorite!)

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Fall Theme – Potluck and Game Night!
